name: Tanya Reilly (@whereistanya@hachyderm.io)
summary:
The kiddo's doing a research project for school and yesterday I  was telling her to ignore the Google snippet summary thing and look on Wikipedia instead. Follow the links and check the citations, obv, but it's the place to go to get a first general overview of the topic.

"Trust Wikipedia, not Google". The internet's changed a bit, hasn't it?
